Quality Education.reason: Course aims to cultivate cultural perspectives and understanding of religions → relevant to Quality Education.

正視宗教在當地現代社會中的位置和角色

Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions.reason: Course discusses religion-state relations and their impact on society → relevant to Peace and Justice.

宗教和政府或國家的關係往往直接影響宗教的實踐
調整對東南亞宗教與國家、社會關係的刻板印象
